relatedBlades.title: Protect against today's phishing and BEC attacks while preparing for the landscape of tomorrow
relatedBlades.copy:
![Gartner® Email Security](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/3cl0QVijOQaifBkZQiA4JH/17fb05f487d45714216a49c402afe830/gartner-email-security-image.png) As cloud adoption accelerates, solutions that integrate directly into Microsoft 365 and Google Workspace help improve threat detection accuracy, and ease evaluation and deployment. On October 7, 2021, Gartner® released their latest 'Market Guide for Email Security.' "The findings and recommendations in this research were derived from more than 1,400 Gartner client interactions between June 2020 and June 2021." The latest report offers guidance to ensure that your email security solution remains appropriate for the changing landscape — particularly in the face of increasing malware, Business Email Compromise, account takeover threats, and other sophisticated attacks. __Read this new report to learn__:
- How native email security from cloud email providers is replacing Secure Email Gateway (SEG) capabilities - Why the rise of business email compromise and targeted attacks requires specific ML and AI based protection - The rise of Integrated Cloud Email Security (ICES) as a market category
